mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.department_name departmentName FROM company_department a WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.department_name = #{departmentName}
mapper.insert: INSERT into company_department (id, company_id, department_name, department_desc, p_id, create_id, create_time, overtime_settlement_type) VALUES (#{id}, #{companyId}, #{departmentName}, #{departmentDesc}, #{pId}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{overtimeSettlementType})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) childsNum FROM sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE b.department_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) companyJobNum FROM company_job b WHERE b.department_id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.department_name departmentName, a.department_desc departmentDesc, a.company_id companyId, a.overtime_settlement_type overtimeSettlementType FROM company_department a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.department_name title, a.p_id parentId, CASE a.p_id WHEN '0' THEN true ELSE true END isLast, '[{"type": "0", "isChecked": "0"}]' checkArr, CASE a.p_id WHEN '0' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END level FROM company_department a WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY a.p_id ASC
SELECT a.id, a.department_name name FROM company_department a WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT a.id, a.department_name name, '部门' title, a.p_id parentId, a.company_id companyId FROM company_department a

SELECT a.id, CONCAT_WS('_', b.company_name, a.department_name) departmentName, a.department_desc departmentDesc, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE b.department_id = a.id) userNum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company_job c WHERE c.department_id = a.id) jobNum FROM company_department a, company_mation b WHERE a.company_id = b.id
AND a.department_name LIKE '%${departmentName}%'
AND b.company_name LIKE '%${companyName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id, CONCAT_WS('_', b.company_name, a.department_name) `name` FROM company_department a, company_mation b WHERE a.company_id = b.id
